selected_quotes: Nature published my response to their whitewashing history

This week, @nature wrote an editorial trampling over minority rights - the only good thing was readers' responses... ht…
@nature's editorial on historical monuments elicited strong reactions, including @coralsncaves
Lol this is not how I envisioned getting published in Nature but I'll take it
